summary: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.
cast: Takeru Satoh|Tatsuya Fujiwara|Emi Takei|Munetaka Aoki|Yû Aoi|Kaito Ohyagi|Yûsuke Iseya|Yôsuke Eguchi|Ryûnosuke Kamiki|Maryjun Takahashi|Tao Tsuchiya|Min Tanaka|Masaharu Fukuyama|Ayumi Beppu|Nayuta Fukuzaki|Maya Fukuzawa|Yûya Hara|Tôru Kizu|Hidekazu Mashima|Ryosuke Miura|Kazufumi Miyazawa|Mitsu Murata|Yukiyoshi Ozawa|Kentarô Shimazu|Ken'ichi Takitô|Akifumi Uchida|Takao Yamada|Kôta Yamaguchi|Hiroko Yashiki|Tomomi Maruyama
keywords: live action remake of anime|historical|19th century|katana sword|japan
title: Kenshin, el guerrero samurai 3 El fin de la leyenda
